## Job.update() method

 update Updates a job's data

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
update(data: T): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  data | T | the data that will replace the current jobs data. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
